_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PANEL
name: BIN
author: eggs@goover.dev
description: A minimal pastebin which also accepts binary files like Images, PDFs and ships multiple clients.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
clear
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m'

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}BIN Installscript${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Egg by gOOvER | https://discord.goover.dev${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Egg is licensed under AGPLv3${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

apt update
apt install -y curl jq

cd /mnt/server
rm -f bin
VERSION=$(curl -I https://github.com/wantguns/bin/releases/latest | awk -F '/' '/^location/ {print  substr($NF, 1, length($NF)-1)}')
curl -sSL -o bin https://github.com/wantguns/bin/releases/download/${VERSION}/bin-${VERSION}-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

chmod +x bin
